string-array.name: titleArray
string-array.item: As soon as you put the money in your pocket, suddenly the ground starts to shake.\n The lava flows into the sea covering the island with dense clouds of vapor!\n Now it\'s time to escape with the treasure!
At the beginning of each turn, the player selects 1 card and uncovers it.
The card has to contain the same character or the same background with the card uncovered in the previous turn!
